<img src="http://errantweb.com/image/logo.png"/>

ErrantWeb has been providing outstanding customer support and services to its clients since its launch in January of 2012. We like to make offers to show that we are still around and to also show that we care about the LowEnd community. We hope that all of you enjoy this offer and we will continue to work our hardest at improving and expanding.

**Go to our website:** http://errantweb.com
**Our IRC Channel:** irc.errantweb.com ( irc.cryto.net ) #errantweb

---
**LowEndTalk KVM Sale**
_Our KVM services our located in our Metro-Detroit Troy, MI location. A test IP will be below for this._
